data.prayer: Father, help the 613 believers in Skikda to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Skikda, Algeria
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 613 believers in Skikda, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 1466 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Skikda, Algeria.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Skikda, Algeria.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bedouin, Suafa people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, please give every church in the state of Skikda a passion to plant another simple church.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 1,466 neighbors who are far from you in Skikda. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Skikda to agree with you and with one another.

location.name: Skikda
location.people_groups_list: Bedouin, Ziban, Berber, Imazighen, Berber, Rif, Bedouin, Nail, Bedouin, Dui-Menia
